N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4501.2 - Designation of records access officer

State Regulations
(a) Roosevelt Island Operating Corporation is
responsible for ensuring compliance with the regulations herein, and designates
the following person as the records access officer: Harvey Harth

Community Liaison

Roosevelt Island Operating Corporation
591 Main Street

Roosevelt Island, NY 10044
(b) The records access officer is responsible
for ensuring appropriate agency response to public requests for access to
records. The designation of record access officer shall not be construed to
prohibit officials who have in the past been authorized to make records or
information available to the public from continuing to do so. The records
access officer shall ensure that personnel: (1)
maintain an up-to-date subject matter
list; (2)
assist the requester in
identifying requested records, if necessary; (3)
upon locating the records, take one of
the following actions: (i) make records
available for inspection; or
(ii)
deny access to the records in whole or in part and explain in writing the
reasons therefor; (4)
upon request for copies of records, make a copy available upon payment of
established fees, in accordance with section
4501.8
of this Part; (5)
upon request, certify that a record is a
true copy; and
(6)
upon failure to
locate records, certify that: (i) Roosevelt

Island Operating Corporation is not the custodian for such records; or
(ii)
the records of which

Roosevelt Island Operating Corporation is a custodian cannot be found after
diligent search. Notes
